Sophomore runningback Tony Jones stiffarms a Colorado State defender during the Rocky Mountain Showdown on Sept PERIOD   PERIOD Kai CaseyCU Independent File

Amy is a Junior studying architectural engineering at the University of Colorado  Boulder and is the visual content and multimedia editor at the CU Independent PERIOD She graduated from Cypress Creek High School in Houston Texas were she was the photo editor on the yearbook and newspaper staff PERIOD Upon receiving her first SLR camera in seventh grade Amy has found a true passion and pleasure in photography and her friends say she is never seen with out a camera with her PERIOD Other than photography Amy enjoys being active and playing Frisbee with Kali the CU Womens Ultimate Frisbee team PERIOD
Contact CU Independent Visual Content Editor Amy E PERIOD Leder at Amy.LederColorado.edu or via Twitter at AmyLeder PERIOD
